security_audit.summary: This skill contains only text-based interactive narrative content in a markdown file. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or external commands were detected. The file is purely a role-playing game prompt.

content.value_statement: Embark on a text-based adventure exploring a mysterious alien cave system. Guide astronaut Stella through interactive choices as she discovers bioluminescent crystals and ancient ruins.
actual_capabilities: Character role-play as astronaut Stella Chen
limitations: Text output only, no images or audio
No persistent game state between sessions

use_cases.title: Alien exploration story
use_cases.description: Experience an immersive sci-fi adventure on an alien planet through interactive text.

use_cases.title: Writing inspiration
use_cases.description: Generate ideas for sci-fi stories, dialogue, and world-building elements.

use_cases.title: English practice
use_cases.description: Read and interact with engaging English dialogue in a fun adventure context.

prompt_templates.title: Start adventure
prompt_templates.prompt: Help Stella explore the cave system. What should she do first at the cave entrance?

prompt_templates.title: Choose path
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella found three cave paths. Left goes up with wind, middle goes down toward water, right has strange markings. What path should she take?

prompt_templates.title: Crisis response
prompt_templates.prompt: The cave is collapsing! Stella is trapped. What should she do to escape?

prompt_templates.title: Deep discovery
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella discovered ancient cave carvings that tell a story of an alien civilization. What questions should she ask about this discovery?

output: Stella weighs the risks and her scientific curiosity. She discusses leaving trail markers, checking air quality, and having emergency protocols ready. She makes a reasoned decision to proceed with caution.

best_practices: Guide Stella systematically through each story phase for the full experience
Encourage her scientific reasoning and problem-solving approach
Support her during crisis moments for emotional story beats
anti_patterns: Asking for file operations or system commands
Requesting external data or real-time information

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for interactive text generation.

faq.question: How long does the adventure take?
faq.answer: Each playthrough takes 30-40 minutes with multiple story phases and outcomes.

faq.question: Can choices change the ending?
faq.answer: Yes, exploration paths and crisis choices lead to different story conclusions.

faq.question: Is my data stored?
faq.answer: No data is stored. Each conversation is independent with no persistent state.

faq.question: Why is text mixed with Chinese?
faq.answer: Stella is a Chinese astronaut who naturally mixes languages. This reflects her character authentically.

faq.question: How is this different from other adventure games?
faq.answer: This is pure interactive fiction focused on dialogue and character-driven storytelling, not graphics or combat.
